SEARCH
Package env.agents

Class Agent

java.lang.Object
jason.asSemantics.Agent
env.agents.Agent
All Implemented Interfaces:
jason.util.ToDOM, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Archer, Gatherer, Priest, Warrior
public abstract class Agent extends jason.asSemantics.Agent
The base class for all agents in the environment. Defines common properties and behaviors shared by all agents, such as name, team, state, health points, attack range, attack power, pose, and carried resources.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Agent

      public Agent(String name, boolean team, int max_hp, int attackRange, int attackPower, double landProbability)
      Constructs a new Agent with the specified properties.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the agent.
      team - true if the agent belongs to team 1, false for team 2.
      max_hp - the maximum health points of the agent.
      attackRange - the attack range of the agent.
      attackPower - the attack power of the agent.
      landProbability - the probability of the agent choosing the land path.

      public void startCarrying(Resource carriedResource)

      Parameters:
      carriedResource - the resource to be carried.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the agent is already carrying a resource.

    • stopCarrying

      public void stopCarrying(Resource carriedResource)
      Stops the agent from carrying the resource.
      Parameters:
      carriedResource - the resource to stop carrying.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the agent is not carrying the specified resource.
